scripts.worker:reports:start: npm run worker:reports:new && npm run worker:reports:doc:scan
scripts.worker:reports:doc:scan: export REPORTID=$(cat .lastreportid) && aws sqs send-message --queue-url http://localhost:9324/queue/h2x-worker-queue --message-body "$(envsubst < messages/DocumentsReportsScan.json)" --region local --endpoint-url http://localhost:9324/queue/h2x-worker-queue
scripts.worker:reports:doc: export REPORTID=$(cat .lastreportid) && aws sqs send-message --queue-url http://localhost:9324/queue/h2x-worker-queue --message-body "$(envsubst < messages/DocumentsReportsExecute.json)" --region local --endpoint-url http://localhost:9324/queue/h2x-worker-queue
scripts.worker:reports:manufacturer:scan: export REPORTID=$(cat .lastreportid) && aws sqs send-message --queue-url http://localhost:9324/queue/h2x-worker-queue --message-body "$(envsubst < messages/ManufacturersReportsScan.json)" --region local --endpoint-url http://localhost:9324/queue/h2x-worker-queue
scripts.worker:reports:manufacturer: export REPORTID=$(cat .lastreportid) && aws sqs send-message --queue-url http://localhost:9324/queue/h2x-worker-queue --message-body "$(envsubst < messages/ManufacturersReportsExecute.json)" --region local --endpoint-url http://localhost:9324/queue/h2x-worker-queue
scripts.worker:reports:manufacturer:finalize: export REPORTID=$(cat .lastreportid) && aws sqs send-message --queue-url http://localhost:9324/queue/h2x-worker-queue --message-body "$(envsubst < messages/ManufacturersReportsFinalize.json)" --region local --endpoint-url http://localhost:9324/queue/h2x-worker-queue
